openDoor: An open door. It is made of oldgrowth wood.
wall: A sturdy wall made of stone. It feels cool and slightly damp.
@: You - a brave adventurer searching for fame and fortune.
k: These small, evil, dog-like humanoids usually live underground in tight-knit clans. They have scaly, rust-brown skin and no hair.
!: A small vial containing fragrant, light-green salve. Restores life to %100 when applied.
